ygData.subject: RE: Kill Stealing
ygData.msgSnippet: Rus, I looked on EQ s page. I don t see reference to what you said below. Can you kindly direct me to the URL? From witnessing it myself, I have seen people
ygData.messageBody:
Rus,

I looked on EQ's page. I don't see reference to what you said below. Can you
kindly direct me to the URL?

From witnessing it myself, I have seen people get into trouble from the GMs
for opening trade windows on a KSer. The safest thing to do, depending on
the GMs on your server that is, is to back off, and let the mob just maul
them to death. My main character is a magician, and I will not KS, seeing as
much as I hate it, but if I see another caster try to take my kills from me
or my group, I back off, let the thing wack it to death, and I finish it of
myself and still get the experience. I have no love lost for losers that
have to leech off of me or my group to tank for them.

I would rather see people play it safe when dealing with a KSer, than to
have them report the person and have the VICTIM get in trouble.

Lanadina


----Original Message Follows----
From: Rus <icekool@...>
Reply-To: EQ-Quest@onelist.com
To: "'EQ-Quest@onelist.com'" <EQ-Quest@onelist.com>
Subject: RE: [EQ-Quest] Kill Stealing
Date: Tue, 10 Aug 1999 11:34:24 -0400

From: Rus <icekool@...>

no it isnt bannable.... Read EQ Page (Brad said it specially!),

IT IS ONLY BANNABLE IF YOU FOLLOW THE PERSON AROUND DOING IT ALOT.
Reason, They can turn off their trade window (so do that ALL DAY LONG
without ANY problems)


-----Original Message-----
From: Lanadina the Magician [SMTP:lanadina@...]
Sent: Tuesday, August 10, 1999 8:24 AM
To: EQ-Quest@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EQ-Quest] Kill Stealing

From: "Lanadina the Magician" <lanadina@...>

I would be extremely careful dispelling magic on KSers or putting up a trade
window. Unfortunately, that is considered a bannable offense if you are
caught doing it.

In the past, when a lone wizard was KSing from our group, we COMPLETELY
backed off. One wizard in the throne will NOT be able to survive. The MOB
will frenzy on the wizard for blasting, and I assure you, if he can't get to
the zone in time, he will die <grin>

Lana
